Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

Ravenchief had seen this city years ago when he had accompanied Lord Perseus
to meetings, but now it was practically a ghost town.  The power generators
that ran the engines kept the city suspended over Lake Superior were still
operating the city, but that was the only thing that still appeared to be
working right.

The monorail system that used to carry citizens throughout the city had
derailed at some point, parts of the track seemed to have been destroyed in
firefights.  Some streetlights seems to still operate and although they
couldn't see any signs of movement, there were some vehicles parked on the
streets that appeared to be in good repair.

Ravenchief and Depthcharge proceded down into the streets carefully.

"Ravenchief to base, we've arrived in Relay.  No signs of enemies... or
anyone else.  Proceding to the civic center, maybe we'll find some people
there."

--00163683395a0df28e048da7a256
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
